channel.title: World
channel.description: The Washington Post World section provides information and analysis of breaking world news stories. In addition to our world news and video, Post World News offers discussions and blogs on major international news and economic issues.

item.title: Live updates: Iran’s leader gives defiant address; Israeli strike hits key road at border
item.dc:creator: Andrew Jeong, Frances Vinall, Adela Suliman, Sammy Westfall, Susannah George, Mikhail Klimentov

item.title: At least 70 dead in Haiti gang attack, U.N. says
item.dc:creator: Amanda Coletta, Widlore Mérancourt
item.description: The victims in the attack in a town north of Port-au-Prince included at least 10 women and three infants, the U.N. human rights office said Friday.

item.title: Lebanon war has displaced seeking safety in an unlikely place — Syria
item.dc:creator: Abbie Cheeseman, Suzan Haidamous
item.description: Syria was a transit route for Lebanese fleeing past wars. But it is a much different path to tread now as the country still reels from the fallout of a civil war.

item.title: Two Argentina towns face a torrent of harassment. The culprit: Parrots.
item.dc:creator: María Luisa Paúl
